title: A Blind Man and his Monkey
description: Summary: In Medellin, Colombia, during the time ofPablo Escobar, 15-year old Joe Cardenas is forced to dealwith the sudden suicide of his best friend, Alex Cuevas.An early morning call in December of 1981, sets Joe offon a quest to understand what led Alex to take his life.Summary: In Medellin, Colombia, during the time ofPablo Escobar, 15-year old Joe Cardenas is forced to dealwith the sudden suicide of his best friend, Alex Cuevas.An early morning call in December of 1981, sets Joe offon a quest to understand what led Alex to take his life.The truth Joe discovers threatens the lives of everyone heknows, as he faces Cartel-connected enemies determinedto hide powerful secrets. Armed with nothing but hisingenuity and blind loyalty towards Alex, Joe delvesdeeply into a dark and dangerous world that will test hisfaith and bring him to the brink of despair.
author: R.D. Roldan
